title: Baked salmon with sesame-soy sauce
ingredients: ['900g salmon fillets, with skin', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon soft brown sugar', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons minced onion', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '370g long-grain white rice', '1 teaspoon dried dill', '700ml water']
